Description.Text: The glistening Jewel Hotel on 51st Street opposite Rockefeller Center. Fresh and elegant, guest rooms at The Jewel have custom designed state-of-the-art workstations and premium bedding. In room amenities include free high speed Internet access, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone with voice mail and direct dial number. Guests have a choice of 5 room sizes, and some with views of Rockefeller Center and St. Patricks Cathedral. Rooms with private terraces on request.The custom designed guestrooms are fresh and elegant with state-of-the-art workstations, premium bedding, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone and portable phone with direct dial phone number. Free access to year round indoor/outdoor dining at the Terrace Club next door, free high speed wired and wireless Internet, free printing, use of work stations throughout the hotel, complimentary chilled bottled water, coffee, tea and newspapers, fitness room, 24 hour concierge, and even the option of exercise equipment delivered to the guestroom.

A stones throw from 5th Avenue, St. Patricks Cathedral, Saks Fifth Avenue, the Rockefeller Center Skating Rink and Promenade (locale of the famous Christmas tree), the Top of the Rock, Radio City Music Hall and NBC studios. Near Times Square/Theater District.

SUPERIOR ROOM - Over sized room featuring a queen size bed with refrigerator and microwave , custom designed state-of-the-art workstations, and luxury bedding. In room amenities include free high speed Internet access, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone with voice mail and direct dial number. Some rooms offer sofa seating.
ONE ROOM SUITE WITH KITCHENETTE - Elegant One Room Suite with sleeping area with a queen size bed or two twin beds, living room area with sofa bed and a kitchenette. The custom designed guestroom is fresh and elegant with state-of-the-art workstations, luxury bedding, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone and portable phone with direct dial phone number.
TWO BEDROOM SUITE WITH KITCHENETTE - Two bedroom and two bath suite, plus small seating area and kitchenette. The custom designed guestroom is fresh and elegant with one queen bed and one full bed, state-of-the-art workstations, luxury bedding, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone and portable phone with direct dial phone number.
SUPERIOR ROOM WITH VIEW - Oversized Superior Room with a dramatic view - featuring a queen size bed with refrigerator and microwave, floor to ceiling glass walls with views of St. Patricks, Rockefeller Plaza, and Rockefeller Center. Custom designed state-of-the-art workstations, sofa bed and luxury bedding. In room amenities include free high speed Internet access, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone with voice mail and direct dial number.
SINGLE/SMALL DOUBLE WITH VIEW - Single/Small Double Room with floor to ceiling glass walls with views of St. Patricks, Rockefeller Plaza, and Rockefeller Center. One queen bed, custom designed state-of-the-art workstations and luxury bedding. In room amenities include free high speed Internet access, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone with voice mail and direct dial number.
SINGLE/SMALL DOUBLE - Fresh and elegant, the single/Small/Double Room features one queen bed, custom designed state-of-the-art workstations and luxury bedding. In room amenities include free high speed Internet access, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone with voice mail and direct dial number. Maximum Occupancy:2
STANDARD ROOM WITH VIEW - Larger than the Single/Small Double Room, the Standard View Room with floor to ceiling glass walls offers views of St. Patricks, Rockefeller Plaza, and Rockefeller Center. One queen bed, custom designed state-of-the-art workstations and luxury bedding. In room amenities include free high speed Internet access, LCD TV with multi media connectivity, alarm clock with iPod docking station, eco friendly bathroom fixtures, coffee/tea maker, two line speaker phone with voice mail and direct dial number.
